title: Wrong class and genre category????
review:
How is this classed as horror ??? 
Worst two hours of film I have watched in a long while .... extremely slow dragging Rubbish if you call yourself a true horror fan and put a rating higher than it deserves your a horror yourself !

title: Had to give it a go but geez really ???
review: Had to give this movie a go because of so called good ratings and lots of publicity ... but no just no these sort of movies really make you question intelligent life form of the people making them ... go back to simple horror genre can't even call this a good thriller just dumb !
